page.title: 16Industry
page.content: There are only two big factories in our block, one is the brickworks and the the other is the mill. The{brickworks}is owned by Cheshire Concrete but everybody calls it Ensor. It is down by the canal. There are big piles of sand and lime and other stuff on the other side of the canal and they carry it over the bridge and stick it all in a big machine. It bakes the bricks so they are hard. It is very noisy and dangerous. The mill has been there a long time. It is called{Lea's Mill.}They get grain,peas,molasses and beans and put it in special machines that make it into special foods for different animals. The warehouse and factory smells funny. Both factories take their products away on heavy lorries and they make a lot of noise and smoke.
